alert.note: Alert for Davie (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Davie County through 745 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Mocksville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mocksville, Bermuda Run, Fork Church, Advance and Farmington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
